headline: Jim Cramer Says Williams-Sonoma’s CEO “Moved a Ton of Manufacturing to Vietnam”
summary: Williams-Sonoma, Inc. (NYSE:WSM) is one of the 22 stocks Jim Cramer recently talked about. Coming to the company, Cramer stated: “Laura Alber, CEO of Williams-Sonoma, moved a ton of manufacturing to Vietnam. Her stock’s down more than 6% for the year, intriguing. [It] jumped more than 2% on the tariff news, but that’s nothing.” Williams-Sonoma […]
